title: Radix/Image
description: A customizable image component with configurations for alignment, responsiveness, thumbnail style, and rounded edges.

align.name: Image Alignment
align.description: (Optional) Align images using helper float classes or text alignment classes. Block-level images can be centered using the `.mx-auto` margin utility class.

responsive.name: Responsive Image
responsive.description: (Optional) Toggle for responsive image behavior. Applying `.img-fluid` class sets max-width to 100% and height to auto, enabling the image to scale with the parent element's width.

thumbnails.name: Image with Thumbnail Style
thumbnails.description: (Optional) Enable to apply `.img-thumbnail` class for a thumbnail style (rounded 1px border appearance).

rounded.name: Rounded Image
rounded.description: (Optional) Enable to apply `.rounded` class for an image with rounded corners.
